channel.title: The Veil: Echoes & Reflections
channel.description:
I'm running two tandem series of [The Veil](https://www.samjokopublishing.com/the-veil) over weekends in May! The Veil: Echoes will be on Saturday nights and The Veil: Reflections will be on Sunday nights. Every session will be four hours long. The sessions will be streamed on YouTube and recorded for Gauntlet Hangouts. Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. You *may not* RSVP to **both** series (but you may waitlist)!
The room flickers in front of you for an instant like a PMP losing reception. You hear the hammer snap back on a cheap poly and you can almost smell the ozone as the bullet glides out of the chamber. The window flies apart in shatterproof shards the size of disembodied limbs. Your neurochip feeds you the trajectory of the unequivocal sentence of death speeding your way as your eyes swivel in their machined sockets. Juice crashes through your veins. You've only got a split second to make a move. What do you do?
We will use the [X-card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit#!) and [Script Change](https://briebeau.itch.io/script-change) during our sessions. We will observe the [Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
**Saturdays** [date=2019-05-04 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_8vqRcLZ0ntXgj64qc [date=2019-05-11 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_8wYwmdma_2oeQAoFq [date=2019-05-18 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_8wncVBWKa3CGwDe-p [date=2019-05-25 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_8wu3nTskxWdgYI5gm
**Sundays** [date=2019-05-05 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZuUGN1U6-5ZXfeiD6I [date=2019-05-19 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZuUgPrOypy5XCTPOv_ [date=2019-05-26 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZuV4DvSMrYdlYu2c66

item.description:
@darren wrote:

I am continuing these series in June as one combined series! Will be using the same setting and same characters (if you were in a previous series).
